name: lute
description: Lute is a minimalist, privacy-focused personal search engine that indexes content from your browser or text files. Itâ€™s self-hosted and offers fast full-text search across documents, links, and notes.
features: Personal Search: Index browser content, Search documents, Find links. Your own private search engine.
Full-Text Search: Fast indexing, Relevance ranking, Instant results. Find anything in your content quickly.
Content Indexing: Browser history, Text files, Notes and documents. Index all your personal content.
Privacy-Focused: Self-hosted, No tracking, Local storage. Your searches stay completely private.
Minimal Interface: Clean design, Fast performance, Simple to use. Focused search experience.
Browser Integration: Import bookmarks, Index history, Sync content. Connect with your browser.
Document Support: Multiple formats, Text extraction, Metadata indexing. Search across file types.
Lightweight: Low resource usage, Fast indexing, Efficient storage. Minimal system requirements.
